name: amnisio
description: Write functional reactive code for various platforms using TypeScript
author: Sudarsan Balaji <Sudarsan.Balaji@outlook.com>

scripts.git_clone: git clone https://github.com/AmnisIO/gyrus.git ./.amnisio/board && git clone https://github.com/AmnisIO/rivulet.git ./.amnisio/stream
scripts.init: npm run refresh && npm run platformio_init && npm run git_clone && npm run copy_gyrus_lib && npm run remove_arduino
scripts.upload: npm run typewrite && platformio run -d .amnisio/project -t upload
